title: Nail'd
notes: Screen is flickering, no fullscreen (game runs fine with Wine-3.0)
specs: AMD Phenom II X4 965 / NVIDIA GTX 1050TI

notes:
Tip: After you open the game, hit Enter to skip the video intro.

The default game resolution is 1024x768 and, at least for me, wine wasn't able to scale my monitor screen properly, so I wasn't able to navigate through the game's menu. So, I had to edit the following game file to set the proper screen resolution (open the file with a text editor and search for "Resolution"):

<Steam>/steamapps/compatdata/40380/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/naild/Out/Settings/Video.scr

After that, I played a few races with a Xbox 360 Controller and the game ran smoothly with everything maxed out @60fps+ with no apparent issues.
title: nail'd

notes: I had to copy N'aild configuration backup from old Windows installation into proton prefix, then it runs flawless here. Hit button if black startscreen appears to go further.
title: nail'd
